Every year we are accustomed to such a comprehensive gathering that gives a true picture of the unity of the Jordanians and their familiarity with the good and loyalty to the homeland and loyalty to his Hashemite leadership
Today we are commemorating the centennial of the great Arab Renaissance, with its struggles and principles, launched by the late Sherif Al Arab, Hussein Bin Ali

A group of the members of our valiant security apparatuses rode the precious Jordanians with their pure blood after they were overcome with treachery, and they focused on the security and stability of this fever.
Our watchful devices have been able to arrest the sinful criminal in record time to confirm that this heinous fever will remain insidious for criminality and terrorism as safe and stable.

The words and attitudes of the martyrs' families are still present, and they give a lesson to this determination that produced championships and promised their children and souls a sacrifice for the stability and future of Jordan.

The blessed blood of the martyrs of the security services, the armed forces, their families and their families is a religion in our necks that calls upon us to continue working to develop our Jordanian model
We need to develop the reality of party work in Jordan # and update its speech and tools and the organic link to citizens' issues through programs that are applicable and measurable
His Majesty King Abdullah II has provided his direct guidance and wise leadership to the political reform process, which is fertile ground for the growth of party work and the expansion of its spread

Jordan will remain immune to the courage of its leadership, the strength of its institutions, its lofty principles, the dedication and sacrifices of its people, and Jordan will remain a place of moderation and moderation.
We affirm our support for the Hashemite Blessing Banner, and behind the leadership of the Dean of the Al-Bayt Al-Athar, His Majesty King Abdullah II Ibn Al Hussein, may Allah protect him
